page.title: 14"Bomber" Graham - Interests.
page.content:
{What would you like to be if you {weren't a boxer? I don't really know. Probably a footballer or a rugby player, but definitely not a cricketer because I hate cricket. {Have you any hobbies? Yes, I am a matchbox collector and I also like taking photographs. {Do you think that people will remember {you in 100 years time?} I hope so. Yes, for the achievements I've had already it will go down in history because records are kept.
"Bomber" Graham was talking to pupils of Beck First and Middle School, Sheffield in June 1985.
